sections.blackBlock: A headless frontend solution, integrated with any platform.
sections.greenBlock: Create conversion-driven storefronts, optimized for each audience.

miniBanner.titleText: Seamless collaboration between developers and marketers on top of a serverless global edge.

miniBanner.altBannerBottomImage: interface com tecnologias otimizadas para desenvolvimento web

sections.secondText: The digital experience platform that brings performance and personalization together.
sections.descriptionText: Deliver visually editable sites at a fraction of the time using Deno, Preact, Tailwind and our edge application framework.

sections.title: Build and deploy at the speed of light with reusable and editable building blocks on top of a serverless edge infrastructure.

sections.text: Deco.cx offers an extensible, component-based approach to building UIs. With JSX, you can easily import, create and modify pre-built preact sections that are fully editable by the business user, enabling a faster development process and enhanced maintainability.
sections.title: Sections
sections.subtitle: Editable UI with JSX

sections.text: Leverage our extensive library of pre-built customizable loaders to integrate your project with any API. Deco.cx simplifies data fetching and management, enabling you to focus on what matters most - building great user experiences.
sections.title: Loaders
sections.subtitle: Universally extensible blocks

sections.text: Deploy your projects instantly to the edge with deco.cx, ensuring lightning-fast load times and an optimized user experience across the globe.
sections.title: Deployment
sections.subtitle: Instant deploy to the edge

sections.text: Keep an eye on your website's performance and quickly identify issues with deco.cx's built-in monitoring tools. Debug and resolve problems efficiently to maintain a smooth user experience.
sections.title: Monitoring
sections.subtitle: Performance and bugs

cards.text: With a low learning curve, deco.cx makes the process of learning web development easy and accessible. With just the basics of HTML, CSS, and JavaScript, you can embark on your journey to build amazing web experiences.
cards.title: Easy to learn

cards.text: Use our library or create your own components. With just a single line of code, you can make a content or layout section editable through the CMS.
cards.title: Editable components

cards.text: Deco.cx embraces the power of open-source, fostering a collaborative environment and enabling developers to adapt and extend the platform to fit their unique needs.
cards.title: Fully open source

sections.title: Built for developers. Loved by business users.
sections.col1Text: Deco is a vendor-neutral platform that lets you select the products that are best for you, regardless of the vendor.
sections.col2Text: Faster time to market Pagespeeds affects SEO, visitor engagement and sales. Deco leverages edge computing and CDN capabilities to ensure digital experiences are always fast.
sections.col3Text: Get all the tools you need to build and optimize your headless experience for less price and make your teams work smarter.

sections.secondText: From commerce platforms, to any third party APIs, deco offers an open-source library of pre-built loaders. You can also create your own custom integration workflow.

sections.col1: Manage all storefronts in one place
sections.col2: Easier stack for hiring and training
sections.title: Powered by Deno, Fresh, Twind, and Preact
benefits: Server-side rendering with minimal JavaScript overhead
Instant edge deployment. No build time.

sections.subText: We are already building the largest multiplatform e-commerce community -from Latin America to the world. Here you will find:
sections.col1Text: A self-paced bootcamp for students. Learn webdev for ecommerce from scratch using our modern technologies.
sections.col2Text: We are listing all fulltime job positions we find in the commerce ecosystem, and you can share yours.

sections.mainText: Connect, learn, and get hired in a fast-growing community.
sections.secondText: Join our rapidly expanding multiplatform e-commerce community, spanning Latin America and beyond, with over 1000 members already on board.
sections.mainTextPt1: Baked up by a 730+ members community

sections.quest2: Does deco replaces my current commerce platform?
sections.quest5: How can I get more details on the platform?

questions.answer: Deco.cx is a front-end-as-a-service platform that brings performance and personalization together to create exceptional e-commerce experiences. With built-in CMS, A/B testing, audience personalization, campaigns, and analytics, it's designed for both business users and developers.
questions.question: What is deco?

questions.answer: No, deco does not replace your current commerce platform. Instead, it serves as a headless frontend solution that seamlessly integrates with your existing platform, enhancing its performance and user experience.
questions.question: Does deco.cx replace my current commerce platform?

questions.answer: Deco.cx's tech stack is based on Deno, Twind, and Fresh. Deno is a secure JavaScript and TypeScript runtime, while Twind is a CSS-in-JS library that enables the creation of optimized styles for the web. Fresh is a modern server-side web framework built for Deno. Together, these technologies provide a powerful and secure foundation for creating high-performance and scalable storefronts.
questions.question: What tech stack does deco.cx use?

questions.answer: Deco.cx leverages on cutting-edge technologies such as server-side rendering and global edge infrastructure to ensure fast website performance.
questions.question: How does deco.cx enable fast websites?

questions.answer: Deco's implementation process involves migrating the front-end implementation of an e-commerce store to Deco's tech stack. This migration can be carried out by one of Deco's partner agencies, an independent freelancer, or a developer within the client's own team. The duration of the implementation process typically ranges between 2 weeks and 2 months, depending on the complexity of the store.
questions.question: How is deco’s implementation process?

questions.answer: Join our community on Discord to learn more about deco.cx or get in touch with our sales team for more details.
questions.question: How can I get more details on the platform?
